author: htan@insider.com (Huileng Tan)
title: Bitcoin hits a fresh all-time high above $120,000
description: Bitcoin is now over 29% higher this year.
content:
Bitcoin
 has breached another record level, hitting $120,000 for the first time ever.
On Monday, Bitcoin was 2.5% higher at $120,637.21 at 12:12 a.m. ET.
